# VICON Technologies

> AI-powered fire detection and suppression systems protecting homes and businesses in Southern California.

VICON Technologies manufactures intelligent fire protection systems combining artificial intelligence, thermal imaging, and precision water suppression. The VICON Intelligent Sprinkler System detects fires autonomously and suppresses them before they spread, operating 24/7 with solar power and remote app control.

- Company: VICON Technologies
- Website: https://vicontech.group
- Email: info@vicontech.group
- Phone: (904) 945-3280
- Location: 22515 Aspan Street, Suite F-G, Lake Forest, CA 92630

## Products

- [VICON Intelligent Sprinkler System](https://vicontech.group/products/intelligent-sprinkler-system): AI-powered fire detection and suppression unit with thermal imaging, precision targeting, and 4,000 sq ft coverage. $19,600 retail / $15,680 agent pricing.
- [Model 2](https://vicontech.group/products/model-2): Second-generation fire protection sprinkler system.
- [Model 3](https://vicontech.group/products/model-3): Third-generation fire protection sprinkler system.
- [VK-240](https://vicontech.group/products/vk-240): Compact fire protection unit for targeted coverage.
- [Sanctuary Battery System](https://vicontech.group/battery): 14.3 kWh LiFePO4 battery system scalable to 60 kWh, ensuring fire protection operates during power outages. $12,800.
- [Products Overview](https://vicontech.group/products): Complete catalog of VICON fire protection products and water storage solutions.

- [How It Works](https://vicontech.group/how-it-works): Step-by-step explanation of VICON's AI fire detection, thermal monitoring, and automated suppression process.
